code: export function validateForm(formData,validateField){const result={hasError:false,errors:{}};for(const key in formData){const message=validateField(key,formData);result.hasError=result.hasError?result.hasError:message!==''?true:false;result.errors={...result.errors,[key]:message};}return result;}export const sanitizeErrors=err=>{const sanitizeErrs={};for(const i in err){if(Array.isArray(err[i])){const v=err[i];sanitizeErrs[i]=v.join(' ').toString();}else if(Object.keys(err[i]).length>0){const error=err[i];for(const e in error){const v=error[e];sanitizeErrs[i]=v.join(' ').toString();}}else{sanitizeErrs[i]=err[i].toString();}}return sanitizeErrs;};
